00020 class MessageTypeIndicator {
00021     public:
00022         enum Usage {
00024             MobileOriginated,
00026             MobileTerminated,
00028             InvalidUsage,
00029         };
00030         
00031         enum Type { // do not change oder of enums ! used as index
00033             DeliverReport = 0,
00035             Submit,
00037             Command,
00038 
00040             Deliver,
00042             SubmitReport,
00044             StatusReport,
00045 
00047             ReservedType,
00049             InvalidType,
00050         };
00051 
00053         MessageTypeIndicator();
00055         MessageTypeIndicator(Usage usage, UINT8 *data = 0);
00056 
00058         Type GetType() const;
00059 
00061         void SetType(Type format);
00062 
00063         Usage GetUsage() const { return (m_usage); }
00064         void SetUsage(Usage usage) { m_usage = usage; }
00065 
00067         BOOLEAN IsInvalid() const;
00068 
00070         void Clear();
00071 
00072         Type GetOriginType() const;
00073 
00074     private:
00075         Usage m_usage;
00076         // the format is stored within the bits 3 and 4 of one byte
00077         UINT8 *m_data;
00078 };
